00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 #include <math.h>
00039 #include "constants.h"
00040 #include "GNSS_RxData.h"
00041 #include "GNSS_Estimator.h"
00042 #include "GNSS_OptionFile.h"
00043 
00044 //#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE
00045 #ifndef WIN32
00046 #define _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 using namespace GNSS;
00050 
00051 
00052 /// \brief    Try to sychronize the base and rover measurement sources.
00053 /// \return   true if successful, false if error.
00054 bool GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements( 
00055   GNSS_RxData &rxDataBase,  //!< The base station receiver data.
00056   bool &endOfStreamBase,    //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the base station.
00057   GNSS_RxData &rxDataRover, //!< The rover station receiver data.
00058   bool &endOfStreamRover,   //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the rover station.
00059   bool &isSynchronized      //!< A boolean to indicate if the base and rover are synchronized.
00060   );
00061 
00062 
00063 int main( int argc, char* argv[] )
00064 {
00065   GNSS_RxData rxDataBase;
00066   GNSS_RxData rxDataRover;
00067   GNSS_Estimator Estimator;
00068   bool isValidPath;
00069   bool result;
00070   bool endOfStreamBase = false;
00071   bool endOfStreamRover = false;
00072   bool isSynchronized = false;
00073 
00074   char supermsg[8192];
00075   unsigned nrBytesInBuffer = 0;
00076 
00077   supermsg[0] = 0;
00078 
00079 
00080   unsigned i = 0;
00081   unsigned j = 0;
00082   //unsigned k = 0;
00083 
00084   double dT = 0.0;
00085   double time = 0.0;
00086   double time_prev = 0.0;
00087   
00088   double start_time = 0.0;
00089   double end_time = 604800.0;
00090 
00091   bool wasPositionComputed = false;
00092   bool wasVelocityComputed = false;
00093 
00094   FILE *fid = NULL; 
00095   //FILE *svfid = NULL;
00096 
00097   GNSS_OptionFile opt;
00098 
00099   std::string OptionFilePath;
00100 
00101   bool useLSQ = true;
00102   bool useEKF = false;
00103   bool useRTK = false;
00104   
00105   bool isAtFirstEpoch = true;
00106 
00107   try
00108   {
00109     printf( "\nUSAGE: EGNSS <option file path>\n" );
00110     if( argc != 2 )
00111     {      
00112       return 0;
00113     }
00114     OptionFilePath = argv[1];
00115 
00116     if( !opt.ReadAndInterpretOptions( OptionFilePath ) )
00117     {
00118       printf( "\nInvalid option file.\n" );
00119       return 1;
00120     }
00121 
00122     // Set the start time.
00123     start_time = opt.m_StartTime.GPSWeek*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + opt.m_StartTime.GPSTimeOfWeek;
00124 
00125     // Set the end time.
00126     end_time = opt.m_EndTime.GPSWeek*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + opt.m_EndTime.GPSTimeOfWeek;
00127 
00128     if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod == "LSQ" )
00129     {
00130       useLSQ = true; // least squares is used for the first epoch
00131       useEKF = false;
00132       useRTK = false;
00133     }
00134     else if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod == "EKF" )
00135     {
00136       useLSQ = true; // least squares is used for the first epoch
00137       useEKF = true;
00138       useRTK = false;
00139     }
00140     else if( opt.m_ProcessingMethod == "RTK" )
00141     {
00142       useLSQ = true; // least squares is used for the first epoch
00143       useEKF = false;
00144       useRTK  = true;
00145     }
00146 
00147 
00148 #ifndef _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE    
00149     // Open the output file.
00150     if( fopen_s( &fid, opt.m_OutputFilePath.c_str(), "w" ) != 0 )
00151       return 1;
00152 #else
00153     fid = fopen( opt.m_OutputFilePath.c_str(), "w" );
00154     if( fid == NULL )
00155       return 1;
00156 #endif
00157     
00158 //#define EXTRACTSVDATA      
00159 #ifdef EXTRACTSVDATA
00160     //if( fopen_s( &svfid, "C:\\Zen\\Zenautics\\repos\\prj\\ZNav\\bin\\rover\\oem4wc\\ZNAV_SV.txt", "w" ) != 0 )
00161       //return 1;
00162 
00163 #ifndef _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE    
00164     if( fopen_s( &svfid, "C:\\Zen\\GPS\\ErrorFreeDataSet_10kmBaseline\\znav\\ZNAV_SV.txt", "w" ) != 0 )
00165       return 1;
00166 #else
00167     svfid = fopen( "C:\\Zen\\GPS\\ErrorFreeDataSet_10kmBaseline\\znav\\ZNAV_SV.txt", "w" );
00168     if( svfid == NULL )
00169       return 1;
00170 #endif
00171     
00172 #endif
00173     
00174     if( opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00175     {
00176       result = rxDataBase.Initialize( opt.m_Reference.DataPath.c_str(), isValidPath, GNSS_RxData::GNSS_RXDATA_NOVATELOEM4 );
00177       if( !result )
00178       {
00179         printf( "\nBad path to the reference station data.\n" );
00180         return 1;
00181       }
00182 
00183       if( opt.m_klobuchar.isValid )
00184       {
00185         rxDataBase.m_klobuchar = opt.m_klobuchar;
00186         if( !opt.m_Reference.useIono )
00187           rxDataBase.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00188       }
00189       else
00190       {
00191         rxDataBase.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00192       }
00193       rxDataBase.m_elevationMask = opt.m_elevationMask*DEG2RAD;
00194       rxDataBase.m_locktimeMask  = opt.m_locktimeMask;
00195       rxDataBase.m_cnoMask       = opt.m_cnoMask;
00196 
00197       if( !opt.m_Reference.useTropo )
00198       {
00199         rxDataBase.m_DisableTropoCorrection = true;
00200       }
00201 
00202       result = rxDataBase.SetInitialPVT(
00203         opt.m_Reference.latitudeRads,
00204         opt.m_Reference.longitudeRads,
00205         opt.m_Reference.height,
00206         0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00207         0.0, 0.0,
00208         0.0, 0.0, 0.0,  // position is fixed
00209         0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00210         100.0,
00211         10.0 ); // position is fixed
00212       if( !result )
00213         return 1;
00214     }
00215 
00216     if( !opt.m_Rover.isValid )
00217     {
00218       return 1;
00219     }
00220 
00221     result = rxDataRover.Initialize( opt.m_Rover.DataPath.c_str(), isValidPath, GNSS_RxData::GNSS_RXDATA_NOVATELOEM4 );
00222     if( !result )
00223       return 1;
00224     if( opt.m_klobuchar.isValid )
00225     {
00226       rxDataRover.m_klobuchar = opt.m_klobuchar;
00227       if( !opt.m_Reference.useIono )
00228         rxDataRover.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00229     }
00230     else
00231     {
00232       rxDataRover.m_DisableIonoCorrection = true;
00233     }
00234     rxDataRover.m_elevationMask = opt.m_elevationMask*DEG2RAD;
00235     rxDataRover.m_locktimeMask  = opt.m_locktimeMask;
00236     rxDataRover.m_cnoMask       = opt.m_cnoMask;
00237 
00238     if( !opt.m_Rover.useTropo )
00239     {
00240       rxDataRover.m_DisableTropoCorrection = true;
00241     }
00242 
00243     
00244     result = rxDataRover.SetInitialPVT(
00245       opt.m_Rover.latitudeRads,
00246       opt.m_Rover.longitudeRads,
00247       opt.m_Rover.height,
00248       0.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00249       0.0, 0.0, 
00250       opt.m_Rover.uncertaintyLatitudeOneSigma, 
00251       opt.m_Rover.uncertaintyLongitudeOneSigma, 
00252       opt.m_Rover.uncertaintyHeightOneSigma, 
00253       100.0, 100.0, 100.0,
00254       1000.0,
00255       100.0 );
00256     if( !result )
00257       return 1; 
00258 
00259     if( !opt.m_Reference.isValid )
00260     {
00261       ////
00262       // This is processing of stand-alone data.
00263 
00264       while( !endOfStreamRover )
00265       {
00266         result = rxDataRover.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00267         if( !result )
00268           return 1;
00269         if( rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week == 0 )
00270           continue;
00271 
00272 
00273         time = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00274 
00275         if( time < start_time )
00276           continue;
00277 
00278         if( time > end_time )
00279           break;
00280 
00281 
00282 
00283         // exclude satellites as indicated in the option file
00284         for( j = 0; j < opt.m_Rover.nrSatsToExclude; j++ )
00285         {
00286           for( i = 0; i < rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00287           {
00288             if( rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].id == opt.m_Rover.satsToExclude[j] )
00289             {
00290               rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].flags.isNotUserRejected = 0;
00291             }
00292           }
00293         } 
00294 
00295         if( useLSQ )
00296         {      
00297           result = Estimator.PerformLeastSquares_8StatePVT(
00298             &rxDataRover,
00299             NULL,
00300             wasPositionComputed,
00301             wasVelocityComputed );
00302           if( !result )
00303             return 1;
00304 
00305           if( !wasPositionComputed || !wasVelocityComputed )
00306             continue;
00307 
00308           if( wasPositionComputed && wasVelocityComputed )
00309           {
00310             if( useEKF || useRTK )
00311             {
00312               useLSQ = false; // position/velocity is now seeded
00313               result = Estimator.InitializeStateVarianceCovariance_8StatePVGM(
00314                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lat,
00315                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lon,
00316                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_hgt,
00317                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_vn,
00318                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_ve,
00319                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_vup,
00320                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clk,
00321                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clkdrift,
00322                 Estimator.m_P );
00323               if( !result )
00324                 return 1;
00325             }
00326           }
00327         }
00328         else if( useEKF )
00329         {
00330           result = Estimator.PredictAhead_8StatePVGM(
00331             rxDataRover,
00332             dT,
00333             Estimator.m_T,
00334             Estimator.m_Q,
00335             Estimator.m_P );
00336           if( !result )
00337             return 1;
00338 
00339           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM(
00340             &rxDataRover,
00341             NULL,
00342             Estimator.m_P );
00343           if( !result )
00344             return 1;
00345         }
00346         else if( useRTK )
00347         {
00348           result = Estimator.PredictAhead_8StatePVGM_Float(
00349             rxDataRover,
00350             dT,
00351             Estimator.m_T,
00352             Estimator.m_Q,
00353             Estimator.m_P );
00354           if( !result )
00355             return 1;
00356 
00357           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM_SequentialMode_FloatSolution(
00358             &rxDataRover,
00359             NULL,
00360             Estimator.m_P );
00361           if( !result )
00362             return 1;
00363         }
00364 
00365         printf( "%12.3lf %5d %d %d %d \n", 
00366           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow, 
00367           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,         
00368           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrPsrObsUsed,
00369           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrDopplerObsUsed,
00370           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrAdrObsUsed );    
00371 
00372 
00373         /*
00374         rxDataRover.Debug_WriteSuperMsg80CharsWide( 
00375           supermsg,
00376           8192,
00377           51.0916666667*DEG2RAD,
00378           -114.0000000000*DEG2RAD,
00379           1000.000,
00380           nrBytesInBuffer );
00381 
00382         printf( supermsg );
00383         */
00384 
00385 
00386         fprintf( fid, "%12.4lf %4d %20.10lf %20.10lf %15.3lf %20.10lf %4d %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %20.10lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.2f %10.2f %10.2f\n", 
00387           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow,
00388           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,
00389           rxDataRover.m_pvt.latitudeDegs,
00390           rxDataRover.m_pvt.longitudeDegs,
00391           rxDataRover.m_pvt.height,
00392           rxDataRover.m_pvt.clockOffset,
00393           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrPsrObsUsed,
00394           rxDataRover.m_pvt.vn,
00395           rxDataRover.m_pvt.ve,
00396           rxDataRover.m_pvt.vup,
00397           rxDataRover.m_pvt.clockDrift,
00398           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lat,
00399           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lon,
00400           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_hgt,
00401           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clk,
00402           rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.hdop,
00403           rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.vdop,
00404           rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.tdop        
00405           );        
00406       }
00407     }
00408     else
00409     {
00410       while( !endOfStreamBase && !endOfStreamRover )
00411       {
00412         if( !isAtFirstEpoch ) 
00413           time_prev = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00414 
00415         result = GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements( 
00416           rxDataBase,
00417           endOfStreamBase,
00418           rxDataRover,
00419           endOfStreamRover,
00420           isSynchronized );
00421         if( !result )
00422           return 1;
00423 
00424         if( endOfStreamRover || endOfStreamBase )
00425           break;
00426 
00427         if( rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs == 0 )
00428           continue;
00429 
00430         // Check that the processing time is within the processing interval.
00431         time = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00432         if( time < start_time )
00433           continue;
00434         if( time > end_time )
00435           break;
00436 
00437 
00438         if( isAtFirstEpoch )
00439         {
00440           isAtFirstEpoch = false;
00441           dT = 0.0;
00442         }
00443         else
00444         {
00445           dT = time - time_prev;      
00446           if( dT < 0.0 )
00447           {
00448             // should never happen
00449             printf( "\ndT is negative!\n");
00450             return 1; 
00451           }        
00452         }
00453 
00454         
00455         // exclude satellites as indicated in the option file
00456         for( j = 0; j < opt.m_Rover.nrSatsToExclude; j++ )
00457         {
00458           for( i = 0; i < rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00459           {
00460             if( rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].id == opt.m_Rover.satsToExclude[j] )
00461             {
00462               rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].flags.isNotUserRejected = 0;
00463             }
00464           }
00465         } 
00466 
00467         if( useLSQ )
00468         {      
00469           result = Estimator.PerformLeastSquares_8StatePVT(
00470             &rxDataRover,
00471             &rxDataBase,
00472             wasPositionComputed,
00473             wasVelocityComputed );
00474           if( !result )
00475             return 1;
00476 
00477           if( !wasPositionComputed || !wasVelocityComputed ) //KO Could change this to position only to seed filters
00478             continue;
00479 
00480           if( wasPositionComputed && wasVelocityComputed )
00481           {
00482             if( useEKF || useRTK )
00483             {            
00484               useLSQ = false; // position/velocity is now seeded
00485               result = Estimator.InitializeStateVarianceCovariance_8StatePVGM(
00486                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lat,
00487                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lon,
00488                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_hgt,
00489                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_vn,
00490                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_ve,
00491                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_vup,
00492                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clk,
00493                 rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clkdrift,
00494                 Estimator.m_P );  //KO Could use LS m_P here to keep all information from LS step.
00495               if( !result )
00496                 return 1;
00497             }
00498           }
00499         }
00500         else if( useEKF )
00501         {
00502           result = Estimator.PredictAhead_8StatePVGM(
00503             rxDataRover,
00504             dT,
00505             Estimator.m_T,
00506             Estimator.m_Q,
00507             Estimator.m_P );
00508           if( !result )
00509             return 1;
00510 
00511           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM(
00512             &rxDataRover,
00513             &rxDataBase,
00514             Estimator.m_P );
00515           if( !result )
00516             return 1;
00517         }
00518         else if( useRTK )
00519         {
00520           result = Estimator.PredictAhead_8StatePVGM_Float(
00521             rxDataRover,
00522             dT,
00523             Estimator.m_T,
00524             Estimator.m_Q,
00525             Estimator.m_P );
00526           if( !result )
00527             return 1;
00528 
00529           result = Estimator.Kalman_Update_8StatePVGM_SequentialMode_FloatSolution(
00530             &rxDataRover,
00531             &rxDataBase,
00532             Estimator.m_P );
00533           if( !result )
00534             return 1;
00535         }
00536 
00537         printf( "%12.3lf %5d %d %d %d \n", 
00538           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow, 
00539           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,         
00540           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrPsrObsUsed,
00541           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrDopplerObsUsed,
00542           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrAdrObsUsed );    
00543 
00544         /*
00545         char supermsg[8192];
00546         unsigned nrBytesInBuffer;
00547         rxDataRover.Debug_WriteSuperMsg80CharsWide( 
00548           supermsg,
00549           8192,
00550           51.0916666667*DEG2RAD,
00551           -114.0000000000*DEG2RAD,
00552           1000.000,
00553           nrBytesInBuffer );
00554 
00555         printf( supermsg );
00556         */
00557 
00558 
00559         rxDataRover.m_prev_pvt = rxDataRover.m_pvt;
00560         rxDataBase.m_prev_pvt = rxDataBase.m_pvt;
00561 
00562         fprintf( fid, "%12.4lf %4d %20.10lf %20.10lf %15.3lf %20.10lf %4d %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %20.10lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.4lf %10.2f %10.2f %10.2f\n", 
00563           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow,
00564           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,
00565           rxDataRover.m_pvt.latitudeDegs,
00566           rxDataRover.m_pvt.longitudeDegs,
00567           rxDataRover.m_pvt.height,
00568           rxDataRover.m_pvt.clockOffset,
00569           rxDataRover.m_pvt.nrPsrObsUsed,
00570           rxDataRover.m_pvt.vn,
00571           rxDataRover.m_pvt.ve,
00572           rxDataRover.m_pvt.vup,
00573           rxDataRover.m_pvt.clockDrift,
00574           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lat,
00575           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_lon,
00576           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_hgt,
00577           rxDataRover.m_pvt.std_clk,
00578           rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.hdop,
00579           rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.vdop,
00580           rxDataRover.m_pvt.dop.tdop        
00581           );        
00582       }
00583     }
00584 
00585     // close the output file
00586     fclose( fid );
00587   }
00588   catch( MatrixException& matrixException )
00589   {
00590     printf( "%s", matrixException.GetExceptionMessage().c_str() );
00591   }
00592 
00593 
00594 
00595 
00596 
00597 #ifdef EXTRACTSVDATA
00598     for( i = 0; i < rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00599     {
00600       if( rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].id == prn &&           
00601         rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].system == GNSS_GPS &&
00602         rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].freqType == GNSS_GPSL1 
00603         ) 
00604       {
00605         fprintf( svfid, "%12.4lf %4d %10.1f %10.1f %10.1f %20.10lf %20.10lf %20.10lf\n", 
00606           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow,
00607           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,          
00608           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].cno,
00609           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].satellite.elevation*RAD2DEG,
00610           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].satellite.azimuth*RAD2DEG,
00611           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].psr_misclosure,
00612           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].doppler_misclosure,
00613           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].time_differenced_psr_misclosure
00614           );
00615       }
00616     }
00617 
00618     for( i = 0; i < rxDataRover.m_nrValidObs; i++ )
00619     {
00620       if( rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].id == prn &&           
00621         rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].system == GNSS_GPS &&
00622         rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].freqType == GNSS_GPSL1 
00623         ) 
00624       {
00625         fprintf( svfid, "%12.4lf %4d %10.1f %10.1f %10.1f %20.10lf %20.10lf %20.10lf\n", 
00626           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow,
00627           rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week,          
00628           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].cno,
00629           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].satellite.elevation*RAD2DEG,
00630           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].satellite.azimuth*RAD2DEG,
00631           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].psr_misclosure,
00632           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].doppler_misclosure,
00633           rxDataRover.m_ObsArray[i].time_differenced_psr_misclosure
00634           );
00635       }
00636     }
00637     fclose(svfid);
00638 #endif
00639 
00640   return 0;
00641 }
00642 
00643 
00644 
00645 bool GetNextSetOfSynchronousMeasurements( 
00646   GNSS_RxData &rxDataBase,  //!< The base station receiver data.
00647   bool &endOfStreamBase,    //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the base station.
00648   GNSS_RxData &rxDataRover, //!< The rover station receiver data.
00649   bool &endOfStreamRover,   //!< A boolean that indicates if the end of the data has been reached for the rover station.
00650   bool &isSynchronized      //!< A boolean to indicate if the base and rover are synchronized.
00651   )
00652 {
00653   bool result = false;
00654   double timeBase = 0;
00655   double timeRover = 0;
00656   double timeDiff = 0;
00657 
00658   isSynchronized = false;
00659 
00660   result = rxDataBase.LoadNext( endOfStreamBase );
00661   if( !result )
00662     return 1;
00663   if( endOfStreamBase )
00664     return true;
00665 
00666   result = rxDataRover.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00667   if( !result )
00668     return 1;
00669   if( endOfStreamRover )
00670     return true;
00671 
00672   while( !endOfStreamBase && !endOfStreamRover )
00673   {
00674     timeBase  = rxDataBase.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK  + rxDataBase.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00675     timeRover = rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_week*SECONDS_IN_WEEK + rxDataRover.m_pvt.time.gps_tow;
00676     timeDiff = timeBase - timeRover;
00677 
00678     if( fabs(timeDiff) < 0.010 ) // must match to 10 ms
00679     {
00680       isSynchronized = true;
00681       break; // synchronized
00682     }
00683 
00684     if( timeDiff < 0 )
00685     {
00686       // The rover time is ahead of the base time.
00687       result = rxDataBase.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00688       if( !result )
00689         return 1;
00690     }
00691     else
00692     {
00693       result = rxDataRover.LoadNext( endOfStreamRover );
00694       if( !result )
00695         return 1;
00696     }
00697   }
00698 
00699   return true;
00700 }
